_PAGE_FILTER_LIMIT_TO_ARGUMENTS_:
# Arguments:  
text (String): The input string to be trimmed
[limit=30] (Number): The maximum length of the returned string
[maxThreeDots=true] (Boolean): Indicates whether a maximum of three dots should be shown at the end of the string
_PAGE_FILTER_LIMIT_TO_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterLimitTo is used to limit an input string to a certain maximum length and optionally apply a special dot logic at the end of the string.
